document_data.name: Krak al-Tawil
document_data.location: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.source: [[Secrets of the Lamp|Secrets of the Lamp, Genie Lore]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Krak al-Tawil''', or the '''Long Castle''', was a keep located in the [[City of Brass]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

The castle was found in the [[Ashlarks]] ward of the city.
document_data.Activities: Krak al-Tawil served as the base of operation for the [[Jackals]], a notorious group of [[salamander]]s.
